Observed at: Elk Island National Park 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this morning. A few rain showers beginning early this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 16. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High 14.
